body.p: IAS 12.62A identifies examples of circumstances in which a transaction or event is recognised directly in equity as is permitted or required by another IFRS International Financial Reporting Standard. All of these circumstances result in changes in the recognised amount of equity through recognition of a credit or charge directly to equity.
